properties.entry: Not available in Nintendo eShop on Wii U.
Please check at your local retailer.

Please check in Nintendo eShop
for Nintendo 3DS.

You will need to enter information
using the Wii U GamePad.

Please turn the GamePad on.

An error has occurred.
Please restart Nintendo eShop
and try again.

If the problem persists, please
make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.

An error has occurred.

Please try again later.

If the problem persists, please
make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.

Could not connect to the server.

The network may be busy, or a
server error may have occurred.
Please try again later.

Information on the operational
status of the server is available
through support.nintendo.com.
Only the Wii U GamePad can be used to browse Nintendo eShop.

A system update is required.
To get the update, go to System Settings
and select System Update.
Your current system language is not compatible with this country setting. The language below will be used.

Your current system language is not compatible with this country setting.
Please choose a language from the options shown.

Here you can buy and download software,
view videos about your favourite titles, and more!

Please read the following information
regarding the use of this service.
Select Close to close Nintendo eShop.

You can choose whether or not to receive Nintendo eShop
notifications, which may include commercial information such as
marketing or advertising messages. Such notifications will be sent
by Nintendo via SpotPass and will appear on the Wii U Menu.
Would you like to opt in to receiving these notifications?

Please scroll down to see the entire text.

This allows you to participate in promotions and get stars by
answering surveys for software you downloaded in Nintendo eShop.

Each Club Nintendo account can only be linked to a single
Nintendo Network ID.

Users who do not have a Club Nintendo account can skip this step.
A Club Nintendo account can always be linked at a later date.

Your Club Nintendo account and
Nintendo Network ID are now linked.

There is no information available
for this software title.
Would you like to submit a software review?
Select a publisher to search for.
What do you want to search for?
Select a genre to search for.

If you have a download code, you can enter it here
to download software and add-on content.

To redownload content for a code you've already redeemed,
go to Menu ⇒ Your Downloads, then choose
the software or add-on content you wish to download.

You entered a Nintendo eShop
activation code.

These funds will now be added
to your balance.

The download code could not be
recognised. Please check the code
and try entering it again.

You have entered a Nintendo eShop activation
code. However, such codes are not useable
in your country of residence.

The code could not be recognised.
Please check the code carefully
and try entering it again.

Note that hyphens and the letters
I, O and Z are not used.
Please check that you have not used
any of these characters by mistake.

No download code is necessary, as you
have already purchased this product or
downloaded it before.

Search returned no results.
Try again with different search conditions.
There is not enough data available yet to display charts.
People who downloaded this also downloaded...
● Who do you think this title appeals to more?
● Which style of play is this title more suited to?
Close Nintendo eShop and start Miiverse?
Select the demo you want to try.
This demo is not currently being distributed.

Nintendo eShop will now close so that
the internet browser can start and you can
view the selected information.
Select Close to close Nintendo eShop and return to the game.
You can also continue browsing Nintendo eShop.

Your watch list is full, so you cannot add
any further items to it.

Please remove some items from the list first
if you want to add more.

Would you like to view your list?
The following controllers are required to play this game.
The following accessories are required to play this game.
Touch this button to change video quality and view title information.
Touch this button to view information for add-on content.

You can select a video quality. Standard quality video offers a better picture,
but may not play smoothly if your internet connection is not fast enough.
If this is the case, please select low quality.
You can purchase add-on content for this software.

Are you sure you want to close the add-on
content catalogue? You have marked add-on
content for purchase or download.

To purchase or download this add-on
content, select Cancel now to keep the
catalogue open, then go to the purchase
screen.

If you are sure you want to close the add-on
content catalogue, select Close.
Nothing is available for purchase at this time.
You must have %{title} in order to use this item.
You cannot purchase this as it contains add-on content you already own.

Previously purchased or updated add-on
content has not yet been installed.

Please try again after completing
the installation.

To check the status of the installation,
press the HOME Button and
select Download Management.

You cannot purchase this as it contains
duplicate add-on content.

There is some duplicate add-on content.

No reduction or refunds can be given for
the duplicate content. Is this OK?

You've reached the maximum number that
can be purchased or downloaded at one time.

This add-on content includes content
you already own. Download it anyway?

When purchasing or downloading this
add-on content, any required updates related
to previously purchased add-on content
will also be downloaded.

Preparing...

Please do not turn off the power.

There is not enough free space available
to update the add-on content.

To create sufficient space for the update,
go to Data Management in System Settings
and move or delete some software.

An update is required to use the add-on content you purchased previously.

Update now?

To use the updated add-on content, go to Download Management in the HOME Menu to check that the update data has been downloaded. If the update data has been downloaded successfully, apply the update by starting the corresponding software title.

An update is required to use the add-on
content you purchased previously.

Update now?

To use the updated add-on content, go to
Download Management in the HOME Menu to
check that the update data has been
downloaded. If the update data has been
downloaded successfully, apply the update by
starting the corresponding software title.

When entering the download code for this add-on content,
any required updates related to previously purchased
add-on content will also be downloaded.

The total exceeds the limit that can be
purchased in a single purchase.

The limit is %{price} for each purchase.
Please remove some products and try again.
You do not have any items selected.
You do not own valid passes for this title.

The pass will be valid from the time it is
downloaded. The validity period of the pass
cannot be automatically extended. If you
want to extend the pass's validity, you will
need to purchase or redeem another pass.
If you download another pass before the current
pass expires, the new period will be added
to your current validity period.
You cannot download a pass that exceeds
the total validity period of %{0} day(s).
The validity period is displayed according
to the time zone set for your
Nintendo Network ID.
All registered users on your Wii U console
will be able to use the same downloaded
pass while it is valid. Each user will need
to start Nintendo eShop before using
the pass.
You do not need to purchase a pass because you already have an unlimited pass.

You do not need to download a pass
because you already have an unlimited pass.
You must have %{title} in order to use this item.
You must have %{title} in order to use this item.

You cannot purchase a pass because a pass bought by another
user of this console is still valid. New passes must be bought by
the purchaser of the current pass.

You cannot download a pass because a pass downloaded by another
user of this console is still valid. New passes must be obtained by
the one who downloaded the current pass.

A pass has already been acquired on this
console, so it cannot be acquired again.

Your code can be used on another console.
The pass cannot be purchased, as it would cause the validity period to go over %{0} day(s).
The pass cannot be downloaded, as it would cause the validity period to go over %{0} day(s).

I consent that Nintendo begins with its
performance before the cancellation period
ends. I acknowledge that I thereby lose my
right to cancel.

If there's not enough free space available, go to Data Management in System Settings and move or delete some software.

You will need to close Nintendo eShop in order to go to the Data Management screen.
There is not enough free space available.

If you still don't have enough space after moving or deleting
some software, try using a high-capacity USB storage device.
For more details, see the Wii U Electronic Manual or
the Nintendo website.

About Install Locations:
The console will prioritise the USB storage device when
choosing an install location. If you already have data
(e.g. save data) for software that you had installed previously,
the software will be installed in the same location as the
existing data. If there isn't enough free space, please try
moving the data to a different location.
(Use Data Management in System Settings to move your data.)
You do not have sufficient funds to make this purchase.

There is some content that can already
be used on this console.

Download the content?

This content is already in use
on this console.

This add-on content cannot be purchased.

If you already own New SUPER MARIO
BROS. U, please update to the latest version
of the software to make this add-on content
available for purchase.

Start the software from the Wii U Menu
to update to the latest version.

If you do not yet own New SUPER MARIO
BROS. U, you will need to purchase either
a retail or downloadable version of the game
to make this add-on content available for
purchase.

This add-on content has
already been installed from a disc.
Would you like to purchase it anyway?

The following software title is required to use this add-on content:
%{title}
Do you own this title?

If you don't own it, please select Back.

The following software title is required to use this pass:
%{title}
Do you own this title?
If you don't own it, please select Back.
Touching Purchase will finalise your payment.
Title not playable before release date
Previously purchased items can be redownloaded at no extra cost.
Demo versions can be downloaded for free.
Downloads acquired with a download code are free.
This is a free add-on content update.
Scroll down to see all details.
A coupon code will be applied.
A Just for You offer will be applied.

Processing...
Please wait.

The process may take some time.
Please do not turn off the power.

Processing...
Please wait.

The process may take some time.
Please do not turn off the power.

You've reached the maximum number of
downloads that can be queued at one time.

Start Download Management from the
HOME Menu, and either install completed
downloads or remove any unwanted queued
downloads.

After that, please try downloading
this software/add-on content via
Menu ⇒ Your Downloads.

The download will start automatically.

Download progress can be checked from
Download Management in the HOME Menu.

The receipt can be viewed at any time in
Menu ⇒ Account Activity.

A receipt will be sent to the email address registered to your Nintendo Account.
If a child account is being used, the receipt will be sent to the email address registered to the parent or guardian's Nintendo Account.
Please check the receipt to view purchase details and additional information.

The pass is valid as of now.
If you'd like to play right now, select Close in the
bottom left of the screen to close Nintendo eShop.

There is no need to download this add-on content
because it is already installed.

An error occurred while downloading add-on content for this software.
Please go to Data Management in System Settings, delete the
add-on content, then try downloading it again.

Codes issued to you are written on the receipt after purchase.
The receipt can be viewed at any time in Menu ⇒ Account Activity.

Codes issued to you will be sent to the email address registered to your Nintendo Account.
If a child account is being used, the receipt will be sent to the email address registered to the parent or guardian's Nintendo Account.

The coupon code could not be recognised.

Please check that you have entered
the code from your coupon correctly.
You don't currently have any Just for You offers.
This offer can be used once.
This offer can be used repeatedly during the validity period.
Price without Just for You offer:
Here you can submit reviews for titles you have played.

You cannot submit reviews for software
with a game rating above your age.
On a scale of one to five stars, how would you rate your satisfaction with this software?
Who do you think this title appeals to more?
Which style of play is this title more suited to?

There is no software you can review at this time.

To review a title, you must have played it for at least an hour.

You cannot submit reviews as the Sending of User Information
setting has been set to Don't Send.

This setting can be changed by taking
the following steps from the Wii U Menu.

Open the user-selection screen and select
User Settings ⇒ View/Modify User Information
⇒ Send User Information to Nintendo ⇒ Send.
You don't have any titles on your watch list.

Remove this software title from
your watch list?
You can add any software titles which you find interesting to your watch list.
Make sure you have sufficient funds before purchasing software.

To purchase Wii software you must add Wii Points
to the Wii Shop Channel on the Wii Menu.
Add funds using a Nintendo eShop Card
Add funds using a credit card

You cannot currently add funds to your
balance in your region. We apologise
for the inconvenience.

To use a credit card for payment, visit
https://www.nintendo.eu/N3DS_payment.

To use a credit card for payment, visit
https://www.nintendo.com.au/n3ds-payment.
Carefully read the information on the back of the card.
Add funds using a Nintendo eShop activation code

You cannot add an amount that
would cause your balance to
exceed %{price}.

The Nintendo eShop activation code
could not be recognised. Please check
the code and try entering it again.
These funds will be added to your Nintendo Network ID.

The funds you have added cannot be used with
the Wii Shop Channel or Nintendo DSi Shop.

Please enter the 16-digit activation code.

Nintendo Points Cards cannot be used on Nintendo eShop.

You entered a download code.
This download code will now be processed.
Add funds using a credit card

You cannot add an amount that
would cause your balance to
exceed %{price}.

Failed to authenticate stored credit card
information. The information has been deleted.
Add funds to your balance using this credit card information?

If you use another credit card, the stored
credit card information will be deleted.

Is this OK?

Credit card information has been deleted.
You can now enter a new credit card.
Please enter the four- to eight-character password used to secure your credit card information.
Please be advised that if you enter the password incorrectly three times in a row, your credit card information will be deleted for security reasons.

I consent that Nintendo begins with its
performance before the cancellation period
ends. I acknowledge that I thereby lose my
right to cancel.

By selecting Add Funds, you will confirm payment and
the value shown below will be added to your balance.

Please note that your card issuer might treat this as an
international transaction and impose additional fees.
For details, please contact your card issuer.
Select the credit card to use for this purchase.
Credit card details must be entered by an adult.
This will be encrypted before sending.

The credit card details were
not entered correctly.

Please re-enter your details.
The security code is located on the back of your credit card.

Our secure servers encrypt credit card data transmitted and stored for your shopping service purchases. All such encrypted information is maintained and processed by both Nintendo and our trusted third-party credit card processors on secure computers that are not accessible from the internet.
You can store your credit card information for ease of use in subsequent purchases.

In order to safeguard your information, you'll need to set up a password.
Saved credit card information will be automatically deleted when your card's expiry date is reached.
Please enter a four- to eight-character password, which will be used to secure your credit card information.
Please be advised that if you enter the password incorrectly three times in a row, your credit card information will be deleted for security reasons.
Please enter the password again to confirm.

The password you entered contains
non-alphanumeric characters.

Please create a password containing
only words and numbers.

All the characters of the password you
entered are identical. For security reasons,
please enter a password composed of four to
eight differing alphanumeric characters.

The passwords do not match.

Please try again.
Note to parents and legal guardians

This user requires permission of a parent or legal guardian to use
a credit card. To add funds, you (the cardholder) must enter the
credit card details and agree to the purchase yourself.

Choosing to save your credit card details will be considered
as you having given total permission for this user
to complete future payments using the credit card.

If you do not want to save your credit card details, you can restrict
the saving of credit card details and the adding of funds from
the Wii U Menu (Parental Controls ⇒ Wii U Shopping Services).

Do you accept this explanation and agree to this user using a credit card?

Permission from a parent or legal guardian
is required to use a credit card to add funds.
Please configure Parental Controls to restrict
purchases in Nintendo eShop.
The following items are available for you to check:
Select the item you want to view.
Here you can view titles that have already been downloaded.
There are no downloaded software titles.
Here you can view add-on content that has already been downloaded.
There is no downloaded add-on content.
Here you can view the add-on content that has already been downloaded for this software.

An update is required to use the add-on
content you purchased.

Update now?
There is no recorded activity for this account.
Here you can see the software you have submitted reviews for.

You don't currently have any reviews.
You will be able to see your reviews
here after you submit them.

This will delete all reviews you have submitted.
This data cannot be recovered once deleted.
Are you sure you want to delete your reviews?

Select settings to adjust.
Scroll down to see all available options.

You can change the language setting here.
Select the language you wish to use.
Nintendo eShop needs to close in order to apply this setting.

Nintendo eShop needs to close so that
the language can be changed.

Change language?

You can choose whether or not to receive Nintendo eShop
notifications, which may include commercial information such as
marketing or advertising messages. Such notifications will be sent
by Nintendo via SpotPass and will appear on the Wii U Menu.
Would you like to opt in to receiving these notifications?

You will not receive notifications if the Online Interaction in Games
restriction has been enabled in Parental Controls.

You have chosen not to receive
Nintendo eShop notifications.

(You can change this setting later if you wish.)

You will now receive Nintendo eShop
notifications.

(You can change this setting later if you wish.)

Are you sure you want to delete this
credit card information?
The credit card information has been deleted.

No credit card information has been stored.

Credit card information can be stored only when adding funds.

You can store your credit card information to make it easier
to add funds to your balance in the future.
(You will still have to enter your password every time.)

You have chosen to use standard video
quality.

If video playback is not smooth, please
change this setting to low video quality.
You have chosen low video quality.

Standard quality video offers a better picture, but may not play
smoothly if your internet connection is not fast enough.
If this is the case, please select low quality.

Members of Club Nintendo can link their Nintendo Network ID
to their Club Nintendo account.

This allows you to participate in promotions and get stars by
answering surveys for software you downloaded in Nintendo eShop.

Each Club Nintendo account can only be linked to a single
Nintendo Network ID.

Your Club Nintendo account and
Nintendo Network ID are now linked.

The link between your Club Nintendo account
and your Nintendo Network ID has been
removed.

It is possible to unlink the Club Nintendo account from
the Nintendo Network ID.

Please also note that if your Nintendo Network ID
is linked to other devices, your Club Nintendo
membership will be unlinked for all of them.

Your Nintendo Network ID and
Club Nintendo account will continue to exist separately.

Are you sure you want to unlink your
Club Nintendo account and your
Nintendo Network ID?
This feature is restricted by Parental Controls. To remove the relevant Parental Controls restriction(s), enter your PIN.

If the Game Rating item is restricted, PIN entry removes this restriction until you leave Nintendo eShop. If the Wii U Shopping Services item is restricted, PIN entry removes this restriction only for the next transaction.
Failed to enter the correct PIN.

You cannot purchase or view information
about this software at your age.

You cannot view this content.

The times during which this content can
be viewed have been restricted.
If you are under the age of 18, please have an adult read this for you.

A credit card cannot be used to add funds
due to the age of the current user.
To remove the relevant Parental Controls restriction(s), enter your PIN.

The connection to the server has
timed out due to user inactivity.

Please restart Nintendo eShop
and try again.
